title: Master Weaver's Thesis Book, 1848
medium: Medium: fabric samples, pen and ink with gouache on paper
creditline: Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation
description: Book written in delicate longhand, unsigned, and with no title page.  Contains 141 mises-en-carte, 104 samples of fabrics, in addition to numerous technical drawings and full notes for loom arrangements and descriptions of many fabrics.

exhibitions.title: Faster, Cheaper, Newer, More: The Revolutions of 1848

tombstone.epitaph:
Master Weaver's Thesis Book, 1848.
1848. Medium: fabric samples, pen and ink with gouache on paper. Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation. 1939-40-1.
